snippet: Alex Gordon hit a two-run homer, Jason Vargas pitched into the seventh inning and the Kansas City Royals beat the Texas Rangers 4-1 on Wednesday night to finish off a three-game sweep....

headline.print_headline: Gordon's 2-Run Shot Leads Royals Over Rangers 4-1
headline.main: Gordon's 2-Run Shot Leads Royals Over Rangers 4-1

lead_paragraph: Alex Gordon hit a two-run homer, Jason Vargas pitched into the seventh inning and the Kansas City Royals beat the Texas Rangers 4-1 on Wednesday night to finish off a three-game sweep.
